title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description: Leading infrastructure automation initiatives, mentoring 2-3 junior engineers, architecting migration to EKS. We're a fast-paced fintech startup, Series B funded.

requirements.text: Strong AWS expertise (we're all-in on AWS)
Kubernetes production experience, not just theory
CI/CD pipelines (we use GitLab CI primarily)
Python or Go for automation scripting
AWS certifications (Solutions Architect or DevOps Engineer)

title: Junior DevOps Engineer
description: Great opportunity for someone starting their career or transitioning into DevOps. Work closely with our senior DevOps team, helping with day-to-day operations, automation tasks, and learning production systems management. We believe in mentorship and will invest in training.

requirements.text: B.Sc in Computer Science or related field

title: Lead SRE
description: Build our SRE practice from scratch. Lead SRE responsible for site reliability across all services. Own incident response, on-call rotation, and drive reliability improvements. Our platform is growing fast and we need someone to solve reliability issues.

requirements.text: 8+ years in production systems, at least 3 as SRE
Programming skills in Go or Python

title: Cloud Architect
description: Own the entire infrastructure strategy for a fast-growing SaaS startup. Redesign cloud architecture for scale and cost efficiency, lead migration to multi-region setup, implement cost management (our AWS bill is out of control), and mentor 3-person DevOps team.

requirements.text: Experience scaling systems from thousands to millions of users
Strong FinOps mindset - need to cut costs by 30-40%
Infrastructure as Code expert (CDK or Pulumi preferred)
Deep AWS expertise (EC2, ECS/EKS, RDS, S3, CloudFront, Lambda)

title: Junior Cloud Engineer
description: Join our infrastructure team at an EdTech company with 100K+ students. Work closely with our senior DevOps engineer learning cloud resources, monitoring, CI/CD, automation, and on-call rotation (with senior support). Great learning opportunity with mentorship and clear career growth path.

requirements.text: Some experience with any cloud platform (GCP, AWS, or Azure)
Eager to learn and ask questions

title: Kubernetes Specialist
description: Kubernetes consultant working with multiple clients on architecture design, VM to container migration, multi-cluster management, service mesh, security hardening, performance tuning, and training. This is consulting work with travel, diverse projects, and client-facing responsibilities.

requirements.text: 5+ years container/orchestration experience, minimum 3 years deep Kubernetes
Experience with multiple Kubernetes distributions (EKS, GKE, AKS, OpenShift)
Custom Resource Definitions and Operators experience
